level.heading: Resignation of director.
level.text: A director may resign at any time by giving notice in a record to the limited cooperative association. Unless the notice states a later effective date, a resignation shall be effective when the notice is received by the association.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 806 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act . See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
